analysis.description:
Ez.startDate (/unique_chucks/48/0x0319d12cd0fc416312ccdcd23973e68363adaca2.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/48/0x0319d12cd0fc416312ccdcd23973e68363adaca2.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/48/0x0319d12cd0fc416312ccdcd23973e68363adaca2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/48/0x0319d12cd0fc416312ccdcd23973e68363adaca2.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/48/0x0319d12cd0fc416312ccdcd23973e68363adaca2.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
